text.section:
Sec. 25A-8. [Hospital exception.]
Except where prohibited by state or federal law, any provision of the Code of Miami-Dade County, and any resolution or administrative order of the County requiring a contractor to execute or complete a form or affidavit as a condition of doing business with the Public Health Trust, shall not apply to the current, unexpired term of a contract that exists between a contractor and the Public Health Trust as a result of its acquisition of a new hospital.
